qas.question: What was published in the IEEE Journal in 1988?
What did the literature compendium document?
Where were most of the authors in the JSAC edition?
What was published in the MPEG-1 in 1988?
What did the digital audio document?
Where were most of the papers in the JSAC edition?
What did the collection of coding document?

plausible_answers.text: difficulty of obtaining good, clean digital audio for research purposes

qas.question: What did these coders remark on?

context: A <a0_0><b3_0>literature compendium<b3_0/><a0_0/> for a large variety of audio coding systems was published in the IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications (JSAC), February 1988. While there were some papers from before that time, this collection documented an entire variety of <a1_0><b4_0>finished, working <b6_0>audio coders<b6_0/><b4_0/><a1_0/>, nearly all of them using perceptual (i.e. masking) techniques and some kind of frequency analysis and back-end noiseless coding. Several of these papers remarked on the <b7_0>difficulty of obtaining good, clean digital audio for research purposes<b7_0/>. Most, if not all, of the authors in the JSAC edition were also active in the <a2_0><b5_0>MPEG-1 Audio committee<b5_0/><a2_0/>.
